outputs.output_descr: The project assist in the preparation of strategic plans/PBB and related annual operating plans so as to improve further public sector efficiency. The SRM will allow savings of public funds by improving the efficiency of social programme while at the same time alleviating poverty in Mauritius.

project_descr: Strategic Budgeting project will focus its main interventions in two main areas of the 10-year Economic Reform Programme of the Government of Mauritius
project_title: Strategic Budgeting in the Government of Mauritius
